price: El fuego abrasará sus rostros y quedarán desfigurados.
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
